title: Community Hub
subtitle: Join interest groups and connect with fellow researchers
description: Connect with people passionate about cultural symbols and heritage from around the world.
noGroupsDescription: Try adjusting your search or create a new group
groupNotFoundDescription: The group you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed.
joinToParticipate: Join this group to participate in discussions and see posts from other members
loginRequired: Please log in to join groups and participate in discussions

thematicCommunities.title: Thematic Communities
thematicCommunities.description: Join specialized communities focused on particular symbol traditions, regions, or time periods.

personalSpace.title: Personal Collections
personalSpace.description: Build and organize your own library of symbolic patterns that resonate with you.

intuitiveNavigation.title: Advanced Discovery
intuitiveNavigation.description: Explore connections between symbols across cultures and time periods with our intuitive navigation.
